sense.def:
Kadar ljudje ali stvari
scare someone
, v nekom zbudijo strah.

seg.quote: I didn't mean to scare you.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
gives someone a scare
, nekoga prestraši.

seg.quote: That night I had an even worse scare.

sense.def:
A scare about something
pomeni, da je v nekem trenutku veliko ljudi zaradi nečesa zaskrbljenih ali prestrašenih.

seg.quote: Since none of the fragments picked up was radioactive the scare died down.

sense.def:
To scare animals or people away
ali
to scare them off
pomeni, da živali ali ljudi prestrašimo, tako da odidejo.

seg.quote: The least shadow or movement would scare the fish away.
